properties.name: operation
properties.description: Get information about the bot associated with the access token.

properties.name: Get Administrators
properties.description: Get the Administrators of a chat

properties.name: Get Member
properties.description: Get the member of a chat

properties.name: Leave
properties.description: Leave a group, supergroup or channel

properties.name: Set Description
properties.description: Set the description of a chat

properties.name: Set Title
properties.description: Set the title of a chat

properties.name: Answer Inline Query
properties.description: Send answer to callback query sent from inline bot

properties.name: Edit Message Text
properties.description: Edit a text message

properties.name: Pin Chat Message
properties.description: Pin a chat message

properties.name: Send Animation
properties.description: Send an animated file

properties.name: Send Audio
properties.description: Send a audio file

properties.name: Send Chat Action
properties.description: Send a chat action

properties.name: Send Document
properties.description: Send a document

properties.name: Send Location
properties.description: Send a location

properties.name: Send Media Group
properties.description: Send group of photos or videos to album

properties.name: Send Message
properties.description: Send a text message

properties.name: Send Photo
properties.description: Send a photo

properties.name: Send Sticker
properties.description: Send a sticker

properties.name: Send Video
properties.description: Send a video

properties.name: Unpin Chat Message
properties.description: Unpin a chat message

properties.name: chatId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to send a notification to all chat members about the new pinned message

properties.name: userId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the target user

properties.name: show_alert
properties.description: Whether an alert will be shown by the client instead of a notification at the top of the chat screen

properties.name: text
properties.description: Text of the notification. If not specified, nothing will be shown to the user, 0-200 characters.

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL that will be opened by the user's client

properties.name: queryId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the answered query

properties.name: results
properties.description: A JSON-serialized array of results for the inline query

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: The ID of the file

properties.name: download
properties.description: Whether to download the file

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the message to edit

properties.name: inlineMessageId
properties.description: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit

properties.name: file
properties.description: Animation to send. Pass a file_id to send an animation that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get an animation from the Internet.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: Location longitude

properties.name: media
properties.description: Media to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended) or pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

properties.name: forceReply
properties.description: Whether to show reply interface to the user, as if they manually selected the bot‘s message and tapped ’Reply

properties.name: selective
properties.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

properties.name: inlineKeyboard
properties.description: Adds an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to

properties.name: pay
properties.description: Whether to send a Pay button

properties.name: switch_inline_query_current_chat
properties.description: If set, pressing the button will insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the current chat's input field.Can be empty, in which case only the bot’s username will be inserted

properties.name: switch_inline_query
properties.description: If set, pressing the button will prompt the user to select one of their chats, open that chat and insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the input field. Can be empty, in which case just the bot’s username will be inserted.

properties.name: web_app
properties.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened

properties.name: replyKeyboard
properties.description: Adds a custom keyboard with reply options

properties.name: request_location
properties.description: Whether the user's request_location

properties.name: replyKeyboardOptions
properties.description: Whether to request clients to resize the keyboard vertically for optimal fit

properties.name: one_time_keyboard
properties.description: Whether to request clients to hide the keyboard as soon as it's been used

properties.name: replyKeyboardRemove
properties.description: Whether to request clients to remove the custom keyboard

properties.name: caption
properties.description: Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters

properties.name: disable_notification
properties.description: Whether to send the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

properties.name: disable_web_page_preview
properties.description: Whether to disable link previews for links in this message

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Duration of clip in seconds

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height of the video

properties.name: performer
properties.description: Name of the performer

properties.name: reply_to_message_id
properties.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message

properties.name: message_thread_id
properties.description: The unique identifier of the forum topic

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of the track

properties.name: thumb
properties.description: Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail‘s width and height should not exceed 320.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the video
